methods.name: setMenuGroup
methods.comment: Sets the group for the given menuPath

params.name: menuPath
params.comment: the menuPath for which to assign a group

params.name: group
params.comment: the name of the group for the action with the given menu path

params.name: menuSubGroup
params.comment:
the name used for sorting items in the same group.  If this 
        value is MenuData#NO_SUBGROUP, then sorting is based upon the name of the
        menu item.

methods.name: getMenuGroup
methods.comment: Returns the group for the given menu path

params.name: menuPath
params.comment: the menu path for which to find its group

methods.name: getMenuSubGroup
methods.comment:
Returns the menu subgroup string for the given menu path.  This string is used to perform
 sorting of menu items that exist in the same group.

params.name: menuPath
params.comment: the menu path for which to find its group
